Great game. Highly recommended to all Naruto fans.

There's no US release of Naruto Ultimate Ninja 5, but there's the PAL version of it which causes problem with the video output on some of our TV's. To overcome this, there's a software that will convert the game into NTSC from PAL. Here's the link for the tool: http://www.ps3iso.com/showthread.php?t=743 Credits goes to the developer of the tool.
I have a pcsx2 Emulator 0.9.8, and I couldnt get any single game working, No matter what I tried, But this game actually worked on my Emulator and I advice any fan of Naruto to play this.
To alexman96: To play it on the PC, you need to download a PS2 emulator, which can be found online; the best one is PCSX2, just type it into google and download, it's really easy to use...

this uses PAL video. your TV has to accept that. all region PS2 hardware has full PAL support, and will output it when requested by a game.

 text and menus are English/French/German/Spanish/Italian. voice actors are original Japanese.
